flawed_nl_solution:
He loses 60*0.1=<<60*0.1=6>>6 bars to taxes
That means he has 60-6=<<60-6=50>>50 bars after taxes
So he has 50/2=<<50/2=25>>25 bars after the divorce
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 54, not 50. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
